description: Great esplanade where you can park and spend the night. Without services Quiet. Next to the municipal soccer field.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 0 Calle Bruselas
description: LIDL outdoor parking. Perfect to reach the center of Alcorcón (and possibly metro / bus) during the day, quiet and peaceful during the night. It is a commercial area with lots of parking lots nearby.

title: (28921) Alcorcón - 1 Calle Ávila
description: Laundromat 8 am-10.30pm 4 Eurosport 15 kg

title: (28907) Getafe - 10 Carretera Madrid - Toledo
description: Washing room for motorhomes with a walkway that helps to reach the top of the car, although to wash the roof is a bit complicated, I had to climb the railing to reach it.

title: (28300) Madrid - 2 Diseminado la Pavera
description: Small abandoned but quiet beach. Walkers and a few cars to pass. No services. Quiet night and pleasant start to the day in the sun and by the water.

name: Camping ALPHA Madrid
title: (28906) Camping ALPHA Madrid
description: Camping Alpha Madrid, shaded ground, access Madrid center by bus.

title: (28918) Leganés - 74 Calle del Fresno
description: Long street with many car parks in line. Chalets on one side and a large green area with lakes, benches and swings on the other. Very quiet to spend the night or spend the day. there are containers

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 51 Calle de las Suertes
description: Two areas with picnic tables around a children's play area. It has a drinking water source and you can park well.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 114 Calle de Alfonso X el Sabio
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - 114 Calle de Alfonso X el Sabio
description:
Parking lot of Parque Tierno Galvan, near the Wagner, you can sleep here. 
Fountains with drinking water and toilets in the Parque, which closes at 18.30 in winter. Supernice Parque for kids, with playing gardens, and nice stroll around the lake.

address.street: 114 Calle de Alfonso X el Sabio

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
title_short: (28600) Navalcarnero - 4 Calle de Camilo José Cela
description: A simple parking lot in the middle of the houses. You hear street noise. There are no services, but the place seems safe even if it is absolutely charmless. It's certainly not a place to spend the day, but for an overnight stop if you arrive late, it's fine.

title: (28921) Alcorcón - 7 Calle Soria
description: Self-service laundry

title: (28918) Leganés - 1 Calle Puerto de Piedrafita
description: Large tarmac car park just in front of a police building. In order to visit Madrid, we had bad surprises that completely ruined us one day and this place helped us out with a better feeling felt in terms of security. suitable for any size. Right next to a Park

title: (28916) Leganés - Avenida de Gran Bretaña
description: Unpaved parking next to the Parquesur shopping center. Quiet area at night ideal for overnight. Bathrooms in the mall and can be emptied gray and fill water in the laundry that is stuck.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - C. Viena
description: There is plenty of parking after 5pm. Between the building and the playground there is a drinking water fountain. Lots of green area to walk. In summer it is not recommended, the trees are still small. Vehicle traffic zone.

title: (28916) Leganés - Avenida de Gran Bretaña
description: Norauto car park in Commercial Centre Parquesur, many places, I had to stay there because of a breakdown. In the morning I saw other van on the commercial centre car park. Free wifi and toilets in the commercial centre. a bit noisy

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 5 Calle Europa
description: Open parking lot from a Commercial center. Concrete almost flat surface.

title: (28925) Alcorcón - 5 Calle las Adelfas
description: Laundry, opposite has a supermarket

title: (28922) Madrid - 36F Poligono S
description: Ample Ikea parking. Plenty of space, toilets at Ikea when it's open and you can also eat at Ikea. Quiet at night.

title: (28600) Navalcarnero - 1 Diseminado Camino Agua Riaza
description: Prairie of San Isidro, meadow with small trees and small shadows, is usually quiet but can coincide with some celebration, since there are swings, barbecue area and fountains. Discard coming in the week of San Isidro (May 15) there is a fair all week and it is impossible to park

title: (28925) Alcorcón - 75I Avenida de las Flores
description: Vehicle parking Parque de las Presillas. Alcorcón. You can park for day and night, during the day it is ideal for walking, running ... it has tables. noisy at night, bottle. In time of curfew, great.

title: (28918) Leganés - 1 Poligono 5 de Rustica
description: Recreation area, grove, lake, picnic area.

title: (28918) Leganés -
description: Decent parking near restaurant, lots of picnic tables, quiet at night after 24 hours

title: (28917) La Fortuna - 23 Calle de San Pedro
title_short: (28917) La Fortuna - 23 Calle de San Pedro
description: Parking only for vans due to the size of its streets. Free. 5 minutes from a metro stop to visit Madrid. If you pass through here, a mandatory stop is the DON JAMON bar, the size of its portions and sandwiches and a great price. Quiet area without problems to leave the car and go visit Madrid.

title: (28922) Alcorcón - 7-9 Avenida de América
description:
Long straight line with parking in both directions next to the side entrance of the Tres Aguas Shopping Center (the center parking has a gauge).

Ideal for visiting the shopping center (Mercadona plus all kinds of shops, restaurants, cinemas, etc., ...)

title: (45950) Casarrubios del Monte - Autovía del Suroeste, 47
title_short: (45950) Casarrubios del Monte - Autovía del Suroeste, 47
description: Rest area on the A5 highway, between Valmojado and Santa Cruz del Retamar. It has a large parking lot to spend the night and the restaurant is 24 hours a day. Shower service available.

title: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - M-506
title_short: (28330) San Martín de la Vega - M-506
description: Picnic area next to the Jarama on the old bridge. San Martin de la Vega

title: (45510) Fuensalida - 16 Calle Extremadura
description: Huge completely flat ground parking, surrounded by nature, walks around. Accessible to all vehicles. No services, just garbage and good 4g.

title: (45300) Ocaña -
description: This is not a beautiful place but it's got a huge tree with lots of shade that any size vehicle can fit under easily! we just stopped here for lunch, very near autovia, 200m or so. we here on a Sunday so very quiet

title: (45593) Las Perdices - Parque Comercial Abadía CM-4003
title_short: (45593) Las Perdices - Parque Comercial Abadía CM-4003
description: Launderette with washing and drying facilities. Full self-service. Coffee and snack machine available. also supermarket and other big shops nearby. free parking accessible up to 3.5 tons.

title: (28670) Villaviciosa de Odón -
description: Service area to wash the motorhome, since the washes are high. And free water to recharge.

title: (28670) Villaviciosa de Odón - Paseo Monte de la Villa
title_short: (28670) Villaviciosa de Odón - Paseo Monte de la Villa
description: Quiet parking in the ground. Perfect for one night. A few cars late afternoon ... Seems to be a meeting point in the region.

title: (28044) Madrid - 3 Camino de las Cruces
description: Spacious parking. Monday market

title: (28041) Madrid - 275 Calle Segura
description: Parking in a very quiet area without traffic, a few meters away there is a push-button fountain where water can be loaded. It has a very large park and some shadows.

title: (28041) Madrid - 33 Calle de Beasain
description: Fuente de pulsador

title: (28041) Madrid - 24 Calle Campotéjar
description: Car park at the Orcasitas commuter train station, free and with direct access to the commuter train three stops from the city center (Sol station). Perfect to leave the car in the outskirts and go visit the city. Enough space for motorhome

title: (28041) Madrid - 1 Avenida de Andalucía
description: Exterior parking of the Carrefour supermarket, quiet and safe. Everything went well. Calm and quiet place.

title: (28054) Madrid - Av. de los Poblados, 118
description: Carefour supermarket gas station, with LPG and high stairs for washing.

title: (28041) Madrid - 72 Calle de Guetaria
description: Lavanderia autoservicio con lavadoras y secadoras. Se puede pagar en efectivo, tarjeta o app.

title: (28024) Madrid - 57 Calle Fuente del Tiro
description: Streets with free parking area to leave the van and take the Spanish Aviation metro, which takes you directly to the center of Madrid. We found it to be a quiet area to park all day, we had no problems

title: (28025) Madrid - 5 Calle Besolla
description: Parking space with apartments next to it.

name: Camping Madrid Rainbow
title: (28670) Camping Madrid Rainbow
description: Camping at the edge of the motorway with pretty close places. Good welcome. Clean toilets, free Wifi at the reception. Motorhome area at the top of the campsite. For Madrid, bus nearby.

title: (28044) Madrid - 62 Avenida de los Poblados
description: Free parking for Park&Ride. It’s a 15 minutes metro trip from the city centre. I don’t really know how it is spending the night there, though

title: (45007) Toledo - 36 Calle Río Guadarrama
description: Washers and dryers suitable for all types and sizes of clothing and with washer and dryer exclusively for pet clothing. You don't need to carry detergents. Wash and dry in about an hour. Spacious and comfortable premises, with free wifi. Easy parking.

title: (28041) Madrid - 9B Calle Joaquín Soler
description: Parking next to the metro and the caja mágica

title: (28026) Madrid - 83 Avenida de Rafaela Ybarra
description: It is a parking lot between the pradolongo park and a sports center (with a paid swimming pool in summer and more services), a minute's walk from an entrance to the park there is a public bath, next to a residence. Also, not far away there is a gas station also with restrooms and a store, I don't know if they have more services but it's a question of asking? Nearby you have public transport to get to the city center if you are visiting (bus 60, 6, 78, 81 and metro Plaza Elíptica lines 6 and 11)

title: (28047) Madrid - 167 Calle Valmojado
description: Free parking in front of a park and near a crossroads.

title: (45005) Toledo - 15 Avenida del Madroño
description: Very quiet place to sleep. Calisthenics park area.

title: (28041) Madrid - 90 Camino de Perales
description: Hundreds of public parking spaces next to the apple tree park. at night in September it was mostly empty. trees for shade, quiet area. drinking water point within the park. AC is not expressly prohibited but neighbors are not disturbed, I do not think they come to disturb vans / AC.

title: (28024) Madrid - 111 Calle de Escalona
description: Automatic laundry with extensive opening hours 8:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. and with a washing machine of up to 21 kg, and large dryers of 21 kg next to the N-5. no parking problems or payment area.

title: (28019) Madrid -
description: Automatic washing machines - buy the tokens at the service station)

title: (28041) Madrid - 34 Calle de González Feito
description: Good place to stay 4 the night. Just the closest spot to M30 inner circle and proper place if going to a festival in the Enrique Tierno Galván Park (i.e. tomavistas). just an urban place to park during the day and stay at night, for free in Madrid (which is not easy).

title: (28053) Madrid - 103 Calle Reguera de Tomateros
description:
Large paved but very simple parking lot without limited signage in the immediate vicinity of various sports facilities. 300 m from El Pozo train station and from there suburban trains to Madrid Atocha train station.
Shade morning or afternoon depending on location.

title: (28053) Madrid - 231 Ronda del Sur
description: Parking is prohibited on Sundays and holidays from 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. per market, normally empty esplanade ideal for spending the night in front of the linear park of entrevias

title: (28660) Boadilla del Monte - 13B Paseo de Madrid
title_short: (28660) Boadilla del Monte - 13B Paseo de Madrid
description: Fairground parking, light underground station

title: (45005) Toledo - 4 Calle de Dinamarca
description: Quiet space in which to spend the night. Not advisable on Fridays and not on Saturdays. Not for the superstitious. It is next to the cemetery.

title: (28019) Madrid - 54 Calle Comandante Fontanes
description: Quite and free parking, no heigh limit, ground is sand and pretty flat. Next to a big park where its nice to have breakfast. Also very close to the metro. Neighborhood is really nice and friendly.

title: (28047) Madrid - Av. de Angel Sanz Briz
title_short: (28047) Madrid - Av. de Angel Sanz Briz
description: Free parking next to the metro, from there 20 minutes by metro into the city.

title: (45008) Toledo - 6 Avenida Salto del Caballo
description: Hidden and quiet place next to the road and several mechanic shops. 20 min. from the center on foot.

title: (45003) Toledo - 9 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking is free, without spring water or emptying but calm.

title: (28011) Madrid -
description: Site. Very calm. Park and spend the night. Metro station adapted with elevator. Pretty good for wheelchairs

title: (28053) Madrid -
description: Parking in the train of the well little traveled, admits any vehicle is quiet if you would sleep here

title: (28031) Madrid - 81 Calle de Luis I
description: Gas station low cost, with pressure washing where they are suitable for motorhomes, we have seen no faucet. Everything is self-service, there is a vending machine for snacks but there is no WC. Good price of fuel.

title: (45003) Toledo - 1A Camino Safont
description:
A small vacant lot where you can park your camper, also larger ones such as 8m long.

A great alternative for when the other nearby official parking spaces are full. 

From here you can walk to the center in 20-30 minutes.

title: (45003) Toledo - S/N Calle del Salto del Caballo
title_short: (45003) Toledo - S/N Calle del Salto del Caballo
description: Quiet parking next to the fire station, 5 minutes to the center

address.street: S/N Calle del Salto del Caballo

name: Las Cigüeñas
title: (28051) Las Cigüeñas
description: Private motorhome area, located just 6km from Puerta del Sol, buses, metro, and train to the center ..., direct bike path to Madrid planetarium direction ..., the green cycling ring passes in front and goes around Madrid ..., taxis to the center ..., bakery shops etc.

title: (45003) Toledo - 9 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Public parking lot at the indoor pool. Very central, in 15 minutes in the city center. Still quite calm.

title: (45003) Toledo - 2 Carretera Mocejón
description: Stadium car park. It's rough ground but possible to crash for night or two. 5min to toledo town. Best thing it's free :)

title: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Camino de Perales
title_short: (28609) Sevilla la Nueva - Camino de Perales
description: Dehesa in Seville the new, quiet place, you have to take a path to get to the picnic, there is a water source that works in verano.Sitio with much charm in the town.

title: (45006) Toledo - 1 Avenida de Santa Bárbara
description: Parking at the entrance to Toledo, next to the fire station and the soccer field. Quiet and safe place.

title: (28051) Madrid - 34I Autopista M-50
description: Parking with hotel and restaurant. Possibility to eat or just park. Car wash present.

title: (28051) Madrid - 24 Calle Villamanta
description: Highly recommended climbing wall, with plenty of space to park the motorhome.

title: (28047) Madrid -
description: Free parking. Outside the regulated parking area. Next to the Green Wedge Park. Bus to the center 24h. 10 'walking from Madrid Río, 45' walking from Plaza Mayor and Casa de Campo (walking all through the park). Bike path to Madrid Río and Casa de Campo. Ideal to visit Madrid.

title: (45003) Toledo - Av. Castilla la Mancha, 34
description: Simple parking lot, centrally located without any supply and disposal, with many cars, to visit the city, optimal, no separately marked mobile home parking spaces, very clean.

title: (45006) Toledo - s/n Paseo de la Rosa
title_short: (45006) Toledo - s/n Paseo de la Rosa
description: Paid parking at Toledo station, an excellent alternative when the free car parks are full.

title: (28011) Madrid - Unnamed Road
description: Parking limited to the hours of the zoo. Looking a little, you will find places where the ac is perfectly parked. perfect for visiting the zoo.

title: (28018) Madrid - 2 Calle Historias de la Radio
title_short: (28018) Madrid - 2 Calle Historias de la Radio
description: Laundry with 5 washers and 3 dryers. You do not need detergent.

title: (45003) Toledo - 2822 Avenida Castilla la Mancha
description: Parking safon we stayed 2 nights and without problem, we asked in the tourist office
